Discovered repositories from the open source frontier

View the Project on GitHub

UCSBarchlab/OpenTPU

open-source reimplementation of Google’s TensorProcessing Unit by UC Santa Barbara ArchLab

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Open-source tools for running and improving LLM applications—gateway, observability, data feedback, optimization
  • tensor library for machine learning with support for hardware acceleration and model inference
  • Marketplace for exchange of compute resources
  • CUDA kernels, PyTorch notes, LLM blogs, tensor core benchmarks
  • DeepEP — communication library for Mixture-of-Experts and expert parallelism, with all-to-all GPU kernels and low-precision support
  • Taskade MCP—server and codegen for building AI agent tools from OpenAPI APIs, connect agents to external platforms like Claude and Cursor
  • cross-platform Rust graphics API for Vulkan, Metal, D3D12, OpenGL, WebGPU
  • open-source GPU cluster manager for AI models
  • AI framework for task execution
  • open-source coding assistant with agentic features, supports Claude, GPT-4o, Gemini, and local LLMs
